title: @ohos.enterprise.dateTimeManager （系统时间管理）(系统接口)

sections.title: dateTimeManager.setDateTime
sections.summary:

sections.title: dateTimeManager.setDateTime
sections.summary:
setDateTime(admin: Want, time: number): Promise\<void>

**需要权限：** ohos.permi
